quotes.quote: Let thy speech be short, comprehending much in a few words.
quotes.author: Aprocrypha

quotes.quote: Bore: one who has the power of speech but not the capacity for conversation.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Free speech carries with it some freedom to listen.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Thought is the fountain of speech.
quotes.author: Chrysippus

quotes.quote: Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious. Great speech is impassioned, small speech cantankerous.
quotes.author: Chuang-tzu

quotes.quote: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: All speech is vain and empty unless it be accompanied by action.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Today's public figures can no longer write their own speeches or books, and there is some evidence that they can't read them either.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: What this country needs is more free speech worth listening to.
quotes.author: Hansell B. Duckett

quotes.quote: Readiness of speech is often inability to hold the tongue.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Rousseau

quotes.quote: The First Amendment is often inconvenient. But that is besides the point. Inconvenience does not absolve the government of its obligation to tolerate speech.
quotes.author: Justice Anthony Kennedy

quotes.quote: Speak when you are angry--and you will make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: It usually takes more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Well-timed silence hath more eloquence than speech.
quotes.author: Martin Fraquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Be a craftsman in speech that thou mayest be strong, for the strength of one is the tongue, and speech is mightier than all fighting.
quotes.author: Maxims of Ptahhotep

quotes.quote: Do not fight verbosity with words: speech is given to all, intelligence to few.
quotes.author: Moralia

quotes.quote: Tears at times have all the weight of speech.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: I have often regretted my speech, never my silence.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Speech is a mirror of the soul: as a man speaks, so is he.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: In anger we should refrain both from speech and action.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
quotes.author: Saskya Pandita

quotes.quote: It is a great thing to know the season for speech and the season for silence.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote:
Speech is the mirror of the mind.
(Imago Animi Sermo Est)
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Where the speech is corrupted, the mind is also.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Discretion in speech is more than eloquence.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Look wise, say nothing, and grunt. Speech was given to conceal thought.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler

quotes.quote: Much speech is one thing, well-timed speech is another.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Speech is human, silence is divine, yet also brutish and dead: therefore we must learn both arts.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: In a free state there should be freedom of speech and thought.
quotes.author: Tiberius
